amendment.description: To require a report on the information given to individuals enlisting in the Armed Forces of the so-called "stop loss" authority of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2560 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2560 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12788) To require a report on the information given to individuals enlisting in the Armed Forces of the so-called "stop loss" authority of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2560 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2560 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feingold.
